auth.terms_agree: I agree to the Terms of Service
auth.privacy_agree: I agree to the Privacy Policy

map.data_format_error_desc: API response format is different than expected. Displaying default data.
map.data_loading_failure_desc: Failed to fetch cafe information. Displaying default data.
map.location_based_map: Map is displayed based on your current location.
map.location_error_permissions: Failed to get location information. Please check location permissions in settings.
map.browser_location_unsupported: This browser does not support location services.
map.cafe_hours_missing: Cafe operating hours information is missing.
map.hours_selection_error: Please select a pickup time within operating hours ({{openingTime}} - {{closingTime}}).
map.login_for_collection: Login is required to request a pickup.
map.request_success_detail: Your request for {{amount}}L pickup at {{cafeName}} has been completed. Check your My Page.
map.request_failure_desc: An error occurred during the pickup request. Please try again.
map.move_to_current_location: Moving the map to your current location.
map.request_collection_desc: Please enter information to collect coffee grounds from {{cafeName}}.
map.message_placeholder: Enter any message or requests for the cafe owner.
map.pickup_hours: Please select a time within the available pickup hours

mypage.title: My Page
mypage.subtitle: Check your collection history and environmental contribution.
mypage.environmental_impact: Protect the environment with consistent activities
mypage.pending_desc: Coffee grounds collection requests awaiting cafe approval.
mypage.accepted_desc: Coffee grounds collection requests accepted by the cafe. Please visit on the scheduled date.
mypage.completed_desc: Successfully completed coffee grounds collection history.
mypage.rejected_desc: Collection requests rejected due to cafe circumstances.
mypage.cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this collection request? This action cannot be undone.
mypage.new_request_desc: Request collection of coffee grounds from cafes.
mypage.carbon_reduction_per_liter: Approximately 0.6kg CO2 reduction effect per 1L of coffee grounds
mypage.pickup_list_failure: Failed to retrieve the list of pickup requests.
mypage.refreshing_data: Loading the latest pickup request information.

cafe.status_change_saved_ui: Could not save status change to server, but it's reflected in the UI.
cafe.status_change_success_desc: Pickup request has been changed to {{status}}.
cafe.status_change_failure_desc: An error occurred while changing the request status.
cafe.info_loading_failure_desc: An error occurred while retrieving cafe information.
cafe.pickup_list_loading_failure_desc: Failed to retrieve pickup list information
cafe.all_requests_desc: View and manage all collection requests.
cafe.pending_desc: Collection requests awaiting processing. Please accept or reject.
cafe.accepted_desc: List of accepted collection requests. Mark as complete when collection is done.

beans.title: Bean Management
beans.register_desc: Please register the bean information used in your cafe. This information will be provided during collection requests.
beans.description_placeholder: Please describe the taste, aroma, and characteristics of the bean in detail.

validation.name_min: Bean name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.origin_min: Origin must be at least 2 characters.

beans.loading_failure: Failed to retrieve the bean list information
beans.delete_success_desc: The selected bean has been deleted.
beans.delete_failure_desc: Failed to delete the selected bean.

grounds.title: Grounds Registration
grounds.register_desc: Please register the coffee grounds produced today. This information will be used for collection requests.
grounds.bean_register_first: Please register unregistered beans in the Bean Management page first.
grounds.memo_desc: You can make a note of the grounds condition, storage information, or other special considerations.
grounds.espresso_info: Typically, an espresso shot uses about 20g of beans, and 1L of grounds is equivalent to about 50 shots.
grounds.no_grounds: No registered grounds. Please register new grounds.
grounds.data_fetch_error: An error occurred while fetching data. Using dummy data.
grounds.dummy_data_processing: API connection failed but processing with dummy data.
grounds.register_success_desc: {{amount}}L of coffee grounds has been registered.
grounds.server_delete_failure: Failed to delete from server but removing item from the screen.
grounds.delete_success_desc: Selected coffee grounds entry has been deleted.

settings.title: Cafe Settings
settings.manage_desc: Please set the basic information for your cafe. This information will be displayed on the map and collection request screen.
settings.description_placeholder: Please enter a brief introduction about your cafe.
settings.description_hint: Introduce your cafe's features, the beans you use, sustainable activities, etc.
settings.collection_hours_hint: Please enter the hours when coffee grounds collection is available.

validation.name_min: Cafe name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.address_min: Address must be at least 5 characters.
validation.phone_min: Phone number must be at least 10 characters.

settings.save_success_desc: Cafe information has been successfully saved.
settings.save_failure_desc: An error occurred while saving cafe information.

cafe_register.title: Cafe Registration
cafe_register.subtitle: Please register your cafe information for coffee grounds management.
cafe_register.info_desc: Entering accurate information helps users find your cafe more easily and collect coffee grounds.
cafe_register.description_placeholder: Please enter a brief introduction about your cafe.
cafe_register.description_hint: Introduce your cafe's features, the beans you use, sustainable activities, etc.
cafe_register.collection_hours_hint: Please enter the hours when coffee grounds collection is available.

validation.name_min: Cafe name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.address_min: Address must be at least 5 characters.
validation.phone_min: Phone number must be at least 10 characters.

cafe_register.location_success_desc: Your current location has been saved.
cafe_register.location_failure_desc: Unable to determine location. Please enter manually.
cafe_register.location_unsupported_desc: Your browser does not support location services.

ai_solutions.title: AI Upcycling Solutions
ai_solutions.subtitle: AI recommends customized applications considering the characteristics of coffee grounds and bean types.
ai_solutions.tip_dry_desc: Coffee grounds are vulnerable to moisture, so dry them completely before use.
ai_solutions.tip_store_desc: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.
ai_solutions.tip_bean_desc: Dark roasted beans have a strong aroma, while light roasted beans maintain their acidity.
ai_solutions.ai_method_desc1: EcoBin's AI analyzes the characteristics of coffee grounds and bean types to recommend optimal upcycling methods.
ai_solutions.ai_method_desc2: Enter your purpose and bean type in the chat window to receive customized solutions.
ai_solutions.ai_assistant_desc: Enter your desired use and bean type to receive customized upcycling solutions.
ai_solutions.chat_purpose: What purpose would you like to use it for? (Example: scrub, fertilizer, air freshener...)
ai_solutions.chat_bean: What kind of beans are you using? (Enter 'Any' if it doesn't matter)

market.title: Upcycling Market
market.subtitle: Trade and share various upcycled products made from coffee grounds.
market.usually_responds: Usually responds within a few hours
market.message_sent_desc: Your message has been sent to the seller.
market.login_required_desc: You need to login to use this feature.
market.feature_in_development_desc: The posting feature is currently under development.
